_header: Hail full of grace Christ is with thee
Subjects: Virgin Mary, hymns to; carols, to Virgin Mary
_description: James Ryman, A hymn to the Virgin Mary — five quatrains (aaab) with alternating refrains which are joined in the burden: ‘Aue regina celorum / Flos et decus beatorum’

CULEe112.First Lines:
Haile full of grace criste is with theOf alle women blessed thou
                    be…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…thy prayer clere pray thou to herPro salute
                    fidelium
